## Bio

I am a clinical researcher at the Malaysian Institute for Clinical Research. My research focuses on population pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamics and statistical analyses for clinical data. I mainly work with people in phase II and/or phase III clinical trials. My work has been published on journals such the BMJ Open, and Peritoneal Dialysis International.
